snippet: Time Warner’s cable networks, including TBS and HBO, contributed to a 1.9 percent increase in third-quarter net profit, but revenue was offset by weakness at its magazine and movie divisions.
abstract: Time Warner’s cable networks, including TBS and HBO, contributed to a 1.9 percent increase in third-quarter net profit, but revenue was offset by weakness at its magazine and movie divisions.

headline.main: Cable Networks Help Time Warner's Quarterly Profit
headline.print_headline: Cable Channels Help Push Time Warner’s Profit Up
